resources.string: The colour of the three recycle bins are orange, blue and brown
The orange bin is to recycle plastic and aluminium cans.
The blue bin is to recycle glass.
Recycling is not a good habit.
The term 3R stands for reduce, reuse and recycle.
The term "Go Green" stands for using an item once and then throwing it away.
Most things at the recycling plant end up in the landfill anyway.
One of the benefit of recycling is to reduce pollution.
There are 5 arrows in the typical recycling loop.
Are you sure you want to exit?
